content:
Working as a single well-oiled machine, the Killteam can snap off shots at targets as they appear. While this power is in effect, the Kill-team may use their Reactions to make a Standard Attack with a ranged weapon.

Improvement: If the Battle-Brother is Rank 4 or more, both he and the Kill-team can make Semi Auto Bursts and Full Auto Bursts instead of a Standard Attack with their ranged weapons.
